author: cbs8
title: Licensing Agreement: How World Patent Marketing's Low Cost Printing Patent Could Blow Up The Luxury Dining Model - Exclusive Deal for Texas Inventor
text:
Licensing Alert: World Patent Marketing Signs Another 99 Year Exclusive Licensing, Prototyping and Manufacturing Deal with a Texas Inventor
Miami, FL (PRWEB) October 24, 2015
World Patent Marketing , a vertically integrated manufacturer and engineer of patented products, announced a licensing agreement for a product that has the potential to revolutionize printing. The agreement is a 99 year contract for the development, manufacture and distribution of this new printing product.
The agreement covers worldwide licensing and sales, in a partnership between World Patent Marketing and visionary inventor Jim G., from the west coast of Florida.
This printing invention has the potential to affect multiple areas of commerce, including menus in restaurants as well as billboards and business signage. Potentially, the invention may finds its way into use by emergency services, medicine, and municipal signage.
Jim G spent more than four years in product development. He traveled to both Europe and China, as he worked to refine and develop his product. He also tested the product as he traveled around to various countries. The product is now ready for production and distribution on a national and eventually worldwide scale. World Patent Marketing will be important to the success of this product, as it can be used in so many different applications and in different types of industries.
"I am thrilled to be working with World Patent Marketing," said Jim G. "I was told I would get ten minutes to pitch the CEO, Scott Cooper. I ended up sitting with him for three hours. I was mesmerized how he took this concept, was bouncing the idea around came up with this winning strategy. He gave me an offer and gave me one day to accept. He's taking the risk alongside me. Not an easy man to negotiate with but we made a deal. I am looking forward to being the next World Patent Marketing Success Story ."
"This is a global product, a game changer in every sense of the word," said Scott J. Cooper, CEO and Creative Director of World Patent Marketing. "It is a one of a kind printing invention that has literally dozens of potential applications. I jumped all over this one. I have to say, I am really impressed with Jim, this guy has vision and he has guts, he has what it takes to compete with the big guys and win."
"We throw words like revolutionary around all the time," said Jerry Shapiro, Patent Project Manager at World Patent Marketing. "But this is the real deal. It will impact the entire printing industry, from packaging to signs and everything in between. It's totally new, cool, and may even be considered vital once it hits the market. Jim is a real visionary, creative and detail oriented, with a great head for business."
ABOUT WORLD PATENT MARKETING
World Patent Marketing is an innovation incubator and manufacturer of patented products for inventors and entrepreneurs. The company is broken into eight operating divisions: Research, Patents, Prototyping, Manufacturing, Retail, Web & Apps, Social Media and Capital Ventures.
World Patent Marketing is by your side every step of the way, utilizing our capital and experience to protect, prepare, and manufacture your new product idea and get it out to the market. The company sends representatives to to trade shows every month in order to further advocate for its clients. It is just part of the World Patent Marketing cost of doing business.
WORLD PATENT MARKETING REVIEWS
World Patent Marketing complaints from clients are extremely rare which is demonstrated by its A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau and its five star ratings from consumer review sites including: Consumer Affairs, Google, Trustpilot, Customer Lobby, Reseller Ratings, Yelp and My3Cents.
World Patent Marketing is also a proud member of the National Association of Manufacturers, Duns and Bradstreet, the US Chamber of Commerce, the South Florida Chamber of Commerce, the Greater Miami Chamber of Commerce, Association for Manufacturing Excellence, and the New York Inventor Exchange. Visit the worldpatentmarketing.com website. Contact us at (888) 926-8174 (US Eastern Time) or email bill(at)worldpatentmarketing(dot)com.
